short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple note-taking extension for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickNote is a powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to enhance your note-taking experience. Whether you're researching, working, or simply jotting down ideas, QuickNote ensures that you never lose important information again. With real-time auto-saving and seamless integration, this extension becomes an essential tool for your online productivity.
